title: Fake Website?
body:
This website looks suspicious.... No sign in or sign up button can a riot employee  plz clarify??? 

[](http://imgur.com/PsEJ6UQ)

_<link removed, Mindstar>_

replies.body:
Hi guys,

Thanks for the report.  Just confirming that this is not a Riot site.  Please be careful with your personal information online as there's no saying what the people operating the site are trying to achieve.

Cheers
Mindstar
I'm getting lots of invites to this. If it ISN'T Riot, then they need to take action as it has their copyrighted material all over it.
